channel.title: Your First Shader :: goshaders
channel.description: this first chapter will be divided in two: Intialising your godot project and setting up our scene: Setting Up Writing your first godot shader: Setting Up

item.title: Setting Up
item.description: Creating the project Start by launching godot and creating a new project Note The choice of the renderer is not really important for this tutorial BUT if you plan to use compute shaders in the futur you should use Forward+ or Mobile otherwise using Compatibility is fine more of this in the godot documentation.
